entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C

Visibility: 9.7 km

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
